game.name: Bullet Fire 2
game.description:
It is time to enter a battlefield where your move and second counts. We are talking about a brand new action packed challenge where you will have 100 enemies to fight. This battle is not going to be easy for you as the great number of your enemies creates an unwanted pressure on your mind. But, you do not need to bother at all as you will have your own weapon to face off these bad guys. Hunt them fast and kill all 100 enemies in your own style!
Your primary objective in this epic first person shooting game is to take them all enemies down. Try to be complete your mission as fast as you can to secure the maximum points! Do not forget to navigate around different rooms and move around the map to shoot them down fast! You can claim for all the possible achievements available in the game by completing your mission in under 6 minutes. 
Bullet Fire 2 is a highly addictive and super fun 3D multiplayer game where both action and thrill will be available in a great proportion. Have fun alone or invite your friends to be a part of the biggest html5 action packed challenges! Find many more 3D multiplayer FPS games on atmegame.com to test your shooting ability to the maximum! We also maintain a huge collection of gun shooter army games that are suitable for players of all ages. Good luck to become a sharp gun shooter of your city!

game.metaDesc: Play the online free game Bullet Fire 2 at atmegame.com ! We have selected this Shooting games for best excitement and thrill in you!

game.webControlKeys: W,A,SD, ALL ARROWS TO MOVE ,L CLICK TO SHOOT
